title: Always There
description: Tales of knights bound by duty, honor, and each other... Always There—When the princess they are sworn to protect is kidnapped, two knights are separated in their efforts to save her, and in being apart realize what they've always had together. Tournament—a young man accepts an offer to attend a tournament in the hopes that victory finally gain the affections of the man he has loved his entire life. Vow Unto Me—two men, divided by tragedy and grief, are ordered to a remote monastery to unravel a mystery, and finally overcome the problems keeping them apart.
author: Megan Derr
